docs.title: Beyond the Living Fibers
docs.text: Welcome to my digital garden 👋🏼, a space where I cultivate and share my knowledge as a PhD researcher in aerospace engineering at TU Delft. Here, I explore the fascinating world of living composites, as well as other topics that I'm passionate about, such as sustainability, innovation, and technology. Just like a real garden, the content here is constantly evolving and growing, with some ideas blooming beautifully and others needing more attention.

docs.title: AI Tools for Research
docs.text: Many AI assistants have been developed recently, these tools can be useful:

docs.title: Litreture Review:
docs.text:
• Connected Papers

  • Elicit

  • Scite

  • Chat with any PDF

  • Research Rabbit → can be integrated with Zotero

  • Scispace → can be integrated with Zotero
